GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an object containing all data from a specified article

article.title: Am I a cat?
article.author: icellusedkars
article.body: Having run out of ideas for articles, I am staring at the wall blankly, like a cat. Does this make me a cat?

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of comments matching specified article ID

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: removes comment according to specified ID, no data returned
